headline.main: FLORENZ ZIEGFELD DIES IN HOLLYWOOD AFTER LONG ILLNESS; Leading Figure in New York Theatre World Succumbs to Attack of Pleurisy. BILLIE BURKE NEAR HIM Noted Produced of 'The Follies' and Gorgeous Musical Shows Was in 63d Year. BEGAN CAREER IN CHICAGO Known as "Glorifier of the Ameri- can Girl," He Reaped Millions From Big Hits. FLORENZ ZIEGFELD DIES IN HOLLYWOOD

snippet: HOLLYWOOD, July 22 -- Florenz Ziegfeld, musical comedy producer, died tonight at a hospital here.
